top_comments.comment: Are you up for the challenge? I am demonstrating the stretches at a beginner level in this video but if it’s too easy you can go deeper into them 💙

I am doing yoga/exercises every day and it is so hard to find a good video but when I found your Chanel I subscribed right away and now I watch 5 videos every night for my routine I loved your channel keep up the good work

Hi Anna!! I am your biggest fan! 
I have a question can we get taller from stretching? How can we get taller easily? In 1 Or 2 weeks? 

From Your Biggest fan from India!
